titles.title: Supporting the designation of the week of September 16 through September 20, 2024, as "Malnutrition Awareness Week".
Supporting the designation of the week of September 16 through September 20, 2024, as "Malnutrition Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, Ways and Means, and Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Foreign Agriculture, and Horticulture.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of Malnutrition Awareness Week.
